name: Entra ID Impossible Travel Risk Detected
title: Entra ID Impossible Travel Risk Detected
description: Detects sign-in risk events where impossible travel is flagged.
sigma_text:
title: Entra ID Impossible Travel Risk Detected
id: RULE-015
description: Detects sign-in risk events where impossible travel is flagged.
author: detpack-lab
status: experimental
logsource:
  product: azure
  service: entra_id
detection:
  selection:
    activityDisplayName: Sign-in risk detected
    riskEventTypes|contains: impossibleTravel
    riskLevel: high
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - VPN usage or mobile carrier IP changes
level: medium
tags:
  - attack.t1078
  - attack.initial_access
elastic_text: activityDisplayName:"Sign-in risk detected" and riskEventTypes:*impossibleTravel* and riskLevel:"high"
elastic_kql: activityDisplayName:"Sign-in risk detected" and riskEventTypes:*impossibleTravel* and riskLevel:"high"
elastic_esql: FROM logs | WHERE activityDisplayName:"Sign-in risk detected" and riskEventTypes:*impossibleTravel* and riskLevel:"high"
false_positive_notes: VPN usage or mobile carrier IP changes

tuning_knobs.name: allowlist.principal
tuning_knobs.description: Exclude known admin/automation principals that legitimately trigger this behavior.

tuning_knobs.name: allowlist.ip_ranges
tuning_knobs.description: Exclude trusted corporate egress ranges to reduce noise.
